All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddAppointmentController
    This class enables user to add new appointment.
    AddCustomerController
    This class Customer screen enables user to add new customer to the database.
    Appointment
    This is the Appointment class.
    ApptsTodayController
    This class enables user to show a generated report of appointments scheduled for current day.
    ApptTableViewController
    This class enables user to select buttons for going back to previous screen, adding/updating/deleting appointments.
    Contact
    This is the Contact class.
    ContactScheduleController
    This class enables user to generate an appointment schedule for selected contact only.
    Country
    This is the country class.
    Customer
    This is the customer class.
    CustomerApptCount
    This class allows user to run report for number of customer appointments by month and type.
    CustomerTableViewController
    This class enables users able to add, update and delete a customer here.
    DBAppointment
    This class obtains appointment data from the appointments database.
    DBConnection
    This class connects the app to the database.
    DBContact
    This class provides access to contacts database.
    DBCountry
    This is class obtains country data from country database.
    DBCustomer
    This is the Customer DB access class.
    DBFirstLevelDiv
    This is the First Level Division DB class to access database.
    DBQuery
    This class creates a Prepared Statement object.
    DBUser
    This is the user class to access users database.
    FirstLevelDivision
    This is the first level division class.
    LogInController
    This class allows user to log in to the app.
    Main
    This is an appointment scheduling app.
    SelectReportsController
    This class allows user to generate reports.
    UpdateAppointmentController
    This class enables user to edit/update information for appointment that was selected from appointment table view list.
    UpdateCustomerController
    This class is the controller for UpdateCustomerScreen.fxml screen.
    User
    This is the User class.
    WelcomeController
    This class is the controller for Welcome.fxml screen.
